variables.label: Jaeger Version
variables.description: Check out their Docker page for the valid tags https://hub.docker.com/r/jaegertracing/all-in-one/tags

instructions.end: Jaeger has been deployed! Access the UI at http://$$cap_appname.$$cap_root_domain. Send traces to port 6831 (UDP).

description: Distributed tracing platform for monitoring and troubleshooting microservices. Compatible with OpenTelemetry and Zipkin.
